designs.headline: IT SECTOR EXPLOSION
designs.geminiPrompt:
Create a professional financial WhatsApp Status image (1080x1920 portrait):

LAYOUT & STRUCTURE:
- Top 30%: Bold headline "IT SECTOR EXPLOSION" in large white text (120pt)
- Middle 40%: Data visualization showing +2.8% with upward arrow
  * TCS: +4.8% (green)
  * Infosys: +3.2% (green)
  * Wipro: +2.9% (green)
- Bottom 30%: "Tax optimization opportunity" message

DESIGN STYLE: Minimalist, Bloomberg-esque, dark mode
- Dark navy blue gradient background
- Gold accents for premium feel
- Clean, minimalist Bloomberg-esque design
- High contrast for mobile readability

BRANDING:
- Bottom-left: "ARN: ARN-125847" (small white text, 24pt)
- Bottom-right: Logo placeholder area (150x150px)
- Footer: "Building Wealth, Creating Trust" (30pt)

COLOR SCHEME:
- Primary: #1B365D
- Secondary: #0077B5
- Accent: Gold #FFD700 for data points

MOBILE OPTIMIZATION:
- Large, bold fonts (minimum 24pt for small text)
- High contrast ratios
- Clear visual hierarchy
- Professional financial aesthetic
- No debug text, no "1080x1920" watermarks

designs.headline: SMART MONEY MOVED
designs.bodyText:
FII net buyers after 3 weeks
Portfolio rebalancing signal
Opportunity window open
designs.geminiPrompt:
Create an exclusive HNI-focused WhatsApp Status image (1080x1920 portrait):

LAYOUT:
- Top 25%: "SMART MONEY MOVED" in bold white capitals (110pt)
- Center 50%: Huge "₹3,200 Cr" number (140pt) with upward trend arrow
- Bottom 25%: "FII net buyers | Portfolio signal | Act now" + branding

DESIGN:
- Dark charcoal background with subtle texture
- Gold/blue premium gradient overlays
- Sophisticated, executive-level aesthetic
- High-end financial publication quality

COLORS:
- Primary: #1B365D
- Gold accents: #C9A961
- White text: High contrast

BRANDING:
- ARN: ARN-125847 (bottom-left, 24pt)
- Tagline: Building Wealth, Creating Trust (bottom, 28pt)
- Logo area: bottom-right 150x150px

QUALITY:
- Grammy-level design standards
- No debug text
- Perfect centering
- Mobile-optimized fonts

designs.headline: SECTOR ROTATION
designs.bodyText:
IT +2.8%: Book Profits
Pharma +1.9%: Accumulate
Cash: Keep 15-20% Ready
designs.geminiPrompt:
Create a professional actionable WhatsApp Status image (1080x1920 portrait):

LAYOUT:
- Top: "SECTOR ROTATION" headline (100pt, bold)
- Upper-middle: "Your Action Plan" (70pt)
- Middle: 3-step visual checklist with icons:
  ✓ IT +2.8%: Book Profits (green checkmark)
  ✓ Pharma +1.9%: Accumulate (blue)
  ✓ Cash: Keep 15-20% (yellow)
- Bottom: Branding + CTA

DESIGN STYLE: Professional, balanced, data-viz
- Clean professional layout
- Balanced data visualization
- Teal-green color scheme
- Clear action-oriented design

COLORS:
- Primary: #2E8B57
- Secondary: #228B22
- Action green: #34A853 for checkmarks

BRANDING:
- ARN: ARN-138924 (bottom-left, 26pt)
- "Your Financial Growth Partner" (bottom center, 32pt)
- Logo space: bottom-right 150x150px

MOBILE OPTIMIZED:
- Large fonts (min 26pt)
- High contrast
- Scannable layout
- Professional credibility

designs.headline: START YOUR SIP
designs.bodyText:
10 years → ₹11.5 L
15 years → ₹23.8 L
20 years → ₹49.5 L
designs.geminiPrompt:
Create a friendly encouraging WhatsApp Status image (1080x1920 portrait):

LAYOUT:
- Top 20%: "START YOUR SIP" in friendly bold font (110pt)
- Middle 60%: Upward growth chart showing:
  * ₹5,000/month starting point
  * 10 years → ₹11.5 Lakhs (milestone 1)
  * 15 years → ₹23.8 Lakhs (milestone 2)
  * 20 years → ₹49.5 Lakhs (celebration!)
- Bottom 20%: "Begin Your Journey Today!" + branding

DESIGN STYLE: Colorful, friendly, visual-first
- Colorful, friendly, approachable
- Bright engaging colors
- Visual growth metaphor (seedling to tree)
- Celebratory, encouraging vibe

COLORS:
- Primary: #1A73E8
- Secondary: #34A853
- Bright accents: #4CAF50 (growth green), #FF9800 (warm orange)

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
- Upward trending arrow or growth chart
- Celebration icons (🎯, 🚀, 💚 incorporated in design)
- Friendly, non-intimidating aesthetic

BRANDING:
- ARN: ARN-169741 (bottom-left, 28pt)
- "Smart Investments, Secure Future" (bottom, 34pt)
- Logo area: bottom-right 150x150px

EMOTION: Empowering, encouraging, achievable
QUALITY: High visual appeal, scroll-stopping design
